I love freedom, hockey, guns, American women, motorcycles, junk food, and whiskey among other things

body:
>No man can serve two masters

this is why i have a serious problem with priests, preachers, reverends etc, running for office. You may swear an oath to the constitution but who do you serve? your god or the country you swear to serve and protect?

post.title: No man can serve two masters.

body:
That's why I hate the phrase: political beliefs.

You shouldn't have political beliefs. You should have beliefs. And those should lead you to vote for whichever candidate or policy best represents those beliefs.
body_html:
That's why I hate the phrase: political beliefs.

post.title: No man can serve two masters.

body:
Fence sitting is dumb. You *do* know that one side can be in the right and the other in the wrong, right? Because if so, it becomes a moral duty to support the one that's in the right.

I'm not saying that only one side can ever be in the right. But choosing sides, especially when one side seems to hate family, country, and religion, isn't evil in and of itself. In fact, it can be the right thing to do.
body_html:
Fence sitting is dumb. You do know that one side can be in the right and the other in the wrong, right? Because if so, it becomes a moral duty to support the one that's in the right.

I'm not saying that only one side can ever be in the right. But choosing sides, especially when one side seems to hate family, country, and religion, isn't evil in and of itself. In fact, it can be the right thing to do.

author.bio: Considering whether to delete my account. Decided to just set my profile private for now.
author.bio_html: Considering whether to delete my account. Decided to just set my profile private for now.

body:
This isn't "fence sitting." Fence sitting is when there are really only two sides, like "we'll go to war tomorrow" or "we won't go to war tomorrow" and you just sit there going "ehhhhhh."

Neither of the "wings" in America today are in the right. They are just two cultish collections of shitheads. They are the worst people in the country, and somehow they've become *most* of the country. It's very depressing.
